name: Thief for Hire [LD45]
description:
A king has hired you to rob his own subjects as part of a con. Seems like a good gig since you're flat broke.

 Find the keys for the heist and sneak your way into the houses to get as much stuff as possible

Game made for Ludum Dare 45 Jam

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Interact

X - View Inventory
